column1: File description: Table 1 (Heat Model Coefficients) from Bressler, Moore, Rennert, and Anthoff  (2021), "Estimating Country-Level Mortality Damage Functions."

column2: temperature = Increase in yearly average temperatures releative to the 2001-2020 country average.
temperature_hottest_month = Interaction between "tempertaure" covariate and the current population-weighted average temperature in the hottest month for a given country.
temperature_hottest_month_gdp = An additional interaction that accounts for the (log) current per-capita gdp in a given country.
Note: A coefficient set to "0" indicates that covariate was excluded from the model specification.
N/A, using tables from August 1, 2021 working paper version.
